      • createBadgetImage

        public static final org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Image createBadgetImage(org.eclipse.jface.resource.ResourceManager rscMgr,
                                                                     int width,
                                                                     int height,
                                                                     int numberOfNotifications,
                                                                     org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Color backgroundColor,
                                                                     org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Color foregroundColor)
        Creates a red circle with a white bold number inside it. Does not cache the final image.
        Parameters:
        rscMgr - the resource manager used to manage the resources (fonts, colors, images, cursors...)
        width - the width
        height - the height
        numberOfNotifications - the number of notifications
        backgroundColor - the background color
        foregroundColor - the text color
        Returns:
        the image created.
